content: an ad-free printable version of this pattern containing all the step-by-step photos 4 pages total is available **here** 1 crochet this sleek and sophisticated rosewood beanie by crocheting a rectangle using a simple stitch pattern using faux fur pom poms with press buttons allow you to change the look easily touch of mohair lightweight level 3 yarn is used to give a beautiful effect with a slight fuzz and brushed look to check out the interchangeable faux fur pom poms with press buttons that i used with this beanie visit my amazon store here www amazon com/shop/allaboutami if you love the stitch used for this beanie be sure to check out my rosewood cardigan design **here** 2 1 https //www etsy com/ca/listing/754552262/rosewood-beanie-crochet-pattern 2 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-rosewood-cardigan/
